base_description: Rectangular gray block with a small protrusion.
part_description: The object has a main rectangular body and a smaller, raised rectangular part on top, positioned near one corner.
internal_interaction_description: The smaller raised part is integrated onto the main block, potentially serving as a handle or connector. Its placement suggests it may interact structurally or functionally with the main body, possibly providing stability or serving as a mounting point.
external_interaction_description: The object could interact with other mechanical components or serve as a base for additional attachments. Its flat surfaces suggest it can be placed on or attached to other structures, and the protrusion may connect or align with external elements.
